attributes.action: An immediate audit of all MP expenses claimed in the previous 12 months
attributes.additional_details: There are an increasing number of figures published that demand scrutiny.
attributes.background: Despite there being increased exposure of MP's expenses it appears that expense claims are still exceedingly high. There should be an immediate audit of all claims within the last 12 months, with action taken to properly punish anybody found to be abusing public money.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on and monitoring MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
